front.title: S2L Name Identification for Point-to-Multipoint TE LSPs

abstract.t: One of the management requirements for point-to-multipoint (P2MP) Label Switched Paths (LSPs) in Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) networks is the ability to identify source-to-leaf (S2L) sub-lsp by name. This document provides a minor extension to RSVP-TE for P2MP TE LSPs [RSVP-TE- P2MP] to signal name for S2L sub-lsp.
